snippet.title: 7 details you might have missed on season 7 episode 3 of 'Game of Thrones'
snippet.content:
The third episode of season 7 of "Game of Thrones" had two of the main characters finally meeting each other, and a fan favourite meeting their untimely doom. There were multiple call backs to previous scenes and some clues that history might be repeating itself. Here's what you might have missed.

Site highlights each day to your inbox.
